Description of incident: The "Uber partner" app that was designed by the company apparently has leaked drivers information which included their license and Social Security number. An Uber driver found the glitch and communicated his findings with a reporter. More information: http://motherboard.vice.com/read/uber-left-hundreds-of-drivers-licenses-...Update (1/7/2016): New York has agreed to a $20,000 settlement with Uber over their "god view" rider-tracking system that compromised driver information.More information: http://www.cnet.com/news/uber-fined-20k-in-surveillance-data-breach-probe/
